cont.entity_a: Efficient for transferring data from old drives to USB drives. Records files at a fast rate. USB cord is a quick way to retrieve and transfer data.
cont.entity_b: Fast data transfer between external hard drive and computer.

cont.entity_a: Affordable compared to other external zip disk drives.

cont.entity_b: Compatible with Vista and Windows XP.

cont.entity_a: Functions well for reading old backed-up emails and retrieving old ZIP100 data.
cont.entity_b: Reliable for file storage but too small for newer PC backups.
Durable with no problems after extensive use for over a month.

cont.entity_a: 750 MB capacity may not be suitable for large files like movies and games.
cont.entity_b: Small size but good storage capacity.

Condition.comm: Some units may arrive with issues.

cont.entity_a: Some units may arrive used and not function properly.
cont.entity_b: Some units may arrive with physical damage.
Light and slender design for easy travel. Smaller than expected and lightweight.
Connection issues with some computers and consoles. Uses two USB ports, which can be inconvenient.
Bundled backup software may not work for all user profiles. Software is Windows-formatted; may require reformatting for Linux or Mac.
Flimsy construction reported in other models but not in the 120GB version.
Very easy to use with two USB cords for connection. Plug-and-play functionality.
